name: File Compass
description: Semantic file search with HNSW indexing and local Ollama embeddings. Multi-language AST chunking, <100ms queries over 10K+ files.

name: Tool Compass
description: Find MCP tools by describing what you need. 115+ indexed tools, progressive disclosure pattern.

name: Soundboard Plugin
description: Give Claude Code a voice. 12 voices, emotion-aware speech, multi-speaker dialogue.

name: Brain-Dev
description: MCP server for code analysis: test generation, security audits, health scoring.

name: Comfy-Headless
description: Headless ComfyUI with prompt intelligence and video generation.
